# Analysis of the study

- Researchers? 
    + University of York, UK (lead author: Dr Philip Cox)
    + University of Montevideo, Uruguay

- Published in? when (if mentioned)?
    + Journal of Anatomy (04/02/2015) 

- General topic
    + Use of front teeth by biggest rodent (South American cousin to guinea pig) 
- Procedure/what was examined
    + CT scan of skull (Reconstruction of computer model)
    + Testing the model with finite element analysis (= engineering technology which calculates stresses/strains in complex objects)
    
- Conclusions/ discovery
    + Very strong teeth used for:
         + eating & biting
         + tasks requiring strength (eg. digging, defence)
         + => Used front teeth like tusks  (elephant)
